## Video

C Locrian is the seventh mode of the Db major scale\
C Locrian Scale Notes: C Db Eb F Gb Ab Bb\
Locrian Scale Formula: 1 b2 b3 4 b5 b6 b7\
Locrian Scale Intervals: H W W H W W W
